# init(upstream:)

**Initializer**

Creates a publisher that automatically connects to an upstream connectable publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
init(upstream: Upstream)
```

## Parameters

- **upstream**: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.
title: init(upstream:)
